turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: good afternoon, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was looking to order some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let's get that order going. which starbucks should i place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fort Gratiot, Michigan.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: caffè mocha, venti with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: iced.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want any whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that'll be it for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total for your drink of 1 iced venti cafe mocha with 2% milk and whipped cream from the starbucks in fort gratiot comes out to $4.40.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order for pick up now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. i've placed the order, it'll eb ready for pick up in 15 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thank you. Nope. That'll be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thanks, bye.
